alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 14 at 10:33AM AKST until January 14 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Strong winds and blizzard conditions. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. East winds gusting to 70 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS..Plan on difficult travel conditions. Blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Snow drifts will form. Strong winds could damage structures.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
